name: Pylon Pressure
description:
The Department of Infrastructure is keen to start rolling out new state of the art GSM cellular towers across the Pughwarren region, in the most power efficient way possible. Are you up to the task?

Controls: Mouse, single click.

Plays in fullscreen but can be switched to windowed by pressing the button in the top-right of the game window, or pressing ESC.

Four possible endings!

Pylon Pressure was created for #LDJAM #LD39. Theme: Running out of Power. All graphics, sound, game code and music created by me.

Tools: aseprite, Tiled, PhpStorm, phaser, bfxr, bitbucket
